SEARCH
Package org.example.repository

Class MedicineRepository

java.lang.Object
org.example.repository.MedicineRepository
public class MedicineRepository extends Object
This can also can be interpreted conceptually as the Medicine Inventory. This class is responsible for managing the stock of medicines in the clinic. It reads from the medicine database and updates the stock level of medicines. It also provides methods to check the stock level of medicines and update the threshold.
